bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores, in the region of the heart and chest. Yi shuo 醫說 6 quotes Yi jian zhi 夷堅志 6: 時康祖大夫患心漏二十年，當胸數竅，血液長流，屢訪名 醫，皆云不可治 , “ Dai fu Shi Kangzu suffered from heart leakage for twenty years, with blood and [other] liquid flowing from several openings in his chest for a long time. He repeatedly consulted eminent physicians. They all said that it could not be cured”.
